Jan 15 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *AVEVA GROUP PLC - TRADING UPDATE *AVEVA - AVEVA HAD A STRONG QUARTER OF CONTRACT RENEWALS IN THREE MONTHS TO DECEMBER 2020 *AVEVA - REVENUE GROWTH TO APPROXIMATELY 1.5% IN NINE MONTHS TO 31 DECEMBER 2020 ON AN ORGANIC CONSTANT CURRENCY BASIS *AVEVA - RECURRING REVENUE GREW BY 10%, TAKING IT TO 68% OF OVERALL GROUP REVENUE IN PERIOD. *AVEVA - REMAINS CONFIDENT IN FULL YEAR OUTLOOK FOR AVEVA. *AVEVA - TREND TOWARDS DIGITALISATION OF INDUSTRIAL WORLD IS STRONG AND BOARD REMAINS EXCITED ABOUT SIGNIFICANT GROWTH OPPORTUNITIES AHEAD.


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 15-JAN-202107:00:05 GMT
